common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. define: Use this API to upload a video file in parts.
params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The unique ID of the upload task, returned by v2.media.init_video_upload.

","name":"video_upload_id","sample":"sg-11110201-6kh48-mepm7a0ttcw3c3","type":"string","required":"True","key":"aBccwKa"},{"description":"

Sequence number of this part, starting from 0.

","name":"part_seq","sample":"0","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"tTWyEmP"},{"description":"

The content of this part of file. Part size should be exactly equal to part_size returned in v2.media.init_video_upload, except last part of file.

","name":"part_content","sample":"","type":"file","required":"True","key":"JEPdaWW"},{"description":"

MD5 checksum of this part for data integrity validation.

","name":"part_md5","sample":"995bbc002c3ef797addcb010f64626ea","type":"string","required":"True","key":"BQCEkrc"}],"response_params":[{"name":"error","type":"string","sample":"","description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","key":"FWjPBxG"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"HJXscGT"},{"description":"

Indicate warning message you should take care.

","name":"warning","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"iwDySaE"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"e3e3e7f33ee8a35723ec3e694708a301","type":"string","required":null,"key":"bWXeAfj"}]}
